  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)

    • registerDoctor

      public static void registerDoctor() throws Exception
      Registers doctor. Sends data (name, surname, username and password) to the server to store in the database.
      Throws:
      IOException - in case of Input/Output exception.
      NoSuchAlgorithmException - in case of encryption error.
      Exception

    • login

      public static void login() throws Exception
      Logins doctor. The funcion sends input info (username and password) to the server to check in the database. If the info is correct, the user can access a menu to continue with the program, if the info is not correct, the user will go back and have a chance to register or login again.
      Throws:
      IOException - in case of Input/Output exception.
      NoSuchAlgorithmException - in case of encryption error.
      Exception

    • menuUser

      public static void menuUser() throws IOException
      Main user menu.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • printMenuDoctor

      public static void printMenuDoctor()
      Prints main menu.

    • printLoginMenu

      public static void printLoginMenu()
      Prints Register/Login menu.

    • chooseToDoDoctorNotes

      public static DoctorsNote chooseToDoDoctorNotes(MedicalRecord mr) throws Exception
      This function lets the doctor choose whether to create a doctors note about a medical record previously received.
      Parameters:
      mr - received medical record.
      Returns:
      doctors note created over the medical record.
      Throws:
      Exception

    • chooseToSendDoctorNotes

      public static void chooseToSendDoctorNotes(DoctorsNote dn) throws Exception
      This function lets the doctor choose whether to send the doctors note to the server for storage in the database.
      Parameters:
      dn - doctors note.
      Throws:
      IOException - in case of Input/Output exception.
      Exception

    • sendDoctorsNote

      public static void sendDoctorsNote(DoctorsNote doctorsNote) throws Exception
      Sends the doctors note to the server for it to be stored in the database.
      Parameters:
      doctorsNote - doctors note
      Throws:
      IOException
      Exception

    • encryptDataWithPublicKey

      public static byte[] encryptDataWithPublicKey(String data, RSAPublicKey publicKey) throws Exception
      Encrypts the given data using the specified RSA public key.
      Parameters:
      data - the plain text data to be encrypted
      publicKey - the RSA public key used for encryption
      Returns:
      a byte array containing the encrypted data
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during the encryption process, such as issues with the cipher instance
